S04n463:1: atha khalu bhagavānimā gāthā bhāṣitvā sarvāvantaṃ bhikṣusaṃghamāmantrayate sma-ārocayāmi vo bhikṣavaḥ,
S04n463:3: ayaṃ mama śrāvakaḥ kāśyapo bhikṣustriṃśato buddhakoṭīsahasrāṇāmantike satkāraṃ kariṣyati,
S04n463:5: teṣāṃ ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ saddharmaṃ dhārayiṣyati |
S04n463:6: sa paścime samucchraye avabhāsaprāptāyāṃ lokadhātau mahāvyūhe kalpe raśmiprabhāso nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loke bhaviṣyati vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān |
S04n463:10: taccāsya buddhakṣetraṃ śuddhaṃ bhaviṣyati śuci apagatapāṣāṇaśarkarakaṭhalyamapagataśvabhraprapātamapagatasyandanikāgūtholigallaṃ samaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ prāsādikaṃ darśanīyaṃ vaiḍūryamayaṃ ratnavṛkṣapratimaṇḍitaṃ suvarṇasūtrāṣṭāpadanibaddhaṃ puṣpābhikīrṇam |
S04n463:13: na ca tatra māraḥ pāpīyānavatāraṃ lapsyate,
S04n463:16: api tu khalu punastatra lokadhātau tasyaiva bhagavato raśmiprabhāsasya tathāgatasya śāsane saddharmaparigrahāyābhiyuktā bhaviṣyanti ||
S04n463:17: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata—
S04n463:54: atha khalvāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ sthavira āyuṣmāṃśca subhūtirāyuṣmāṃśca mahākātyāyanaḥ pravepamānaiḥ kāyairbhagavantamanimiṣairnetrairvyavalokayanti sma |
S04n463:55: tasyāṃ ca velāyāṃ pṛthak pṛthaṅamanaḥsaṃgītyā imā gāthā abhāṣanta—
S04n463:65: yathā hastasmi prakṣiptaṃ na tadbhuñjīta bhojanam ||14 ||
S04n463:66: evaṃ ca utsukā vīra śrutvā ghoṣamanuttaram |
S04n463:70: atha khalu bhagavāṃsteṣā mahāśrāvakāṇāṃ sthavirāṇāmimamevaṃrūpaṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya punarapi sarvāvantaṃ bhikṣusaṃghamāmantrayate sma-ayaṃ me bhikṣavo mahāśrāvakaḥ sthaviraḥ subhūtistriṃśata eva buddhakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ satkāraṃ kariṣyati,
S04n463:74: evaṃrūpāṃścādhikārān kṛtvā paścime samucchraye śaśiketurnāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loke bhaviṣyati vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān |
S04n463:75: ratnasaṃbhavaṃ ca nāmāsya tad buddhakṣetraṃ bhaviṣyati |
S04n463:86: sa ca bhagavān vaihāyasamantarīkṣe sthitvā abhīkṣṇaṃ dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati,
S04n463:87: bahūni ca bodhisattvaśatasahasrāṇi bahūni ca śrāvakaśatasahasrāṇi vineṣyati ||
S04n463:88: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata—
S04n463:121: atha khalu bhagavān punareva sarvāvantaṃ bhikṣusaṃghamāmantrayate sma-ārocayāmi vo bhikṣayaḥ,
S04n463:123: ayaṃ mama śrāvakaḥ sthaviro mahākātyāyano'ṣṭānāṃ buddhakoṭīśatasahasrāṇāmantike satkāraṃ kariṣyati,
S04n463:125: parinirvṛtānāṃ ca teṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ stūpān kariṣyati yojanasahasraṃ samucchrayeṇa pañcāśad yojanāni pariṇāhena saptānāṃ ratnānām |
S04n463:126: tadyathā suvarṇasya rūpyasya vaiḍūryasya sphaṭikasya lohitamukteraśmargabhasya musāragalvasya saptamasya ratnasya |
S04n463:128: tataśca bhūyaḥ pareṇa paratareṇa punarviśatīnāṃ buddhakoṭīnāmantike evarūpameva satkāraṃ kariṣyati,
S04n463:130: sa paścime samucchraye paścime ātmabhāvapratilambhe jāmbūnadaprabhāso nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loke bhaviṣyati vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavan |
S04n463:131: pariśuddhaṃ cāsya buddhakṣetraṃ bhaviṣyati samaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ prāsādikaṃ darśanīyaṃ sphaṭikamayaṃ ratnavṛkṣābhivicitritaṃ suvarṇasūtrācchoḍitaṃ puṣpasaṃstarasaṃstṛtamapagatanirayatiryagyoniyamalokāsurakāyaṃ bahunaradevapratipūrṇaṃ bahuśrāvakaśatasahasropaśobhitaṃ bahubodhisattvaśatasahasrālaṃkṛtam |
S04n463:135: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata—
S04n463:153: amitā asaṃkhyā pi ca tatra kṣetre |
S04n463:156: atha khalu bhagavān punareva sarvāvantaṃ bhikṣusaṃghamāmantrayate sma-ārocayāmi vo bhikṣavaḥ,
S04n463:159: teṣāṃ ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ vividhaṃ satkāraṃ kariṣyati,
S04n463:161: parinirvṛtānāṃ ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ stūpān kārayiṣyati saptaratnamayān |
S04n463:162: tadyathā suvarṇasya rūpyasya vaidūryasya sphaṭikasya lohitamukteraśmagarbhasya musāragalvasya |
S04n463:164: teṣāṃ ca stūpānāṃ vividhāṃ pūjāṃ kariṣyati puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākāvaijayantībhiḥ |
S04n463:165: tataśca bhūyaḥ pareṇa paratareṇa viṃśaterbuddhakoṭīśatasahasrāṇāmevaṃrūpameva satkāraṃ kariṣyati,
S04n463:167: paścime ca ātmabhāvapratilambhe tamālapatracandanagandho nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loke bhaviṣyati vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān |
S04n463:171: samaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ prāsādikaṃ sudarśanīyaṃ sphaṭikamayaṃ ratnavṛkṣābhivicitritaṃ muktakusumābhikīrṇaṃ bahunaradevapratipūrṇamṛṣiśatasahasraniṣevitaṃ yaduta śrāvakaiśca bodhisattvaiśca |
S04n463:175: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata—
